levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: The essence of the soul, a deep emotional connection.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: A feeling of expectation and desire for something to happen.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: Complete trust or confidence in someone or something.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: A state of tranquility and harmony.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: Elegance and beauty of movement or expression.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: Calm, peaceful, and untroubled.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: The quality of having experience, knowledge, and good judgment.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: Lasting or existing forever.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: The intrinsic nature or indispensable quality of something.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: The combination of parts into a pleasing or orderly whole.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: The quality of being in accordance with fact or reality.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: Reasoning conducted or assessed according to strict principles.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: Evidence or argument establishing a fact or truth.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: Firm and stable in shape; not liquid or fluid.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: Easy to perceive, understand, or interpret.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: Perceptible by touch; clear and definite.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: Existing in a material or physical form.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: Concerned with what is actually the case.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: Taking words in their usual or most basic sense.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: Not influenced by personal feelings or opinions.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: A luminous point in the night sky.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: Earth's natural satellite.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: A celestial object with a tail of light.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: The path of a celestial body around another.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: A celestial body moving around a star.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: A massive system of stars, dust, and gas.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: A cloud of gas and dust in outer space.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: The universe seen as a well-ordered whole.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: A massive and extremely remote celestial object.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: A small rocky body orbiting the sun.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: The quality of being physically strong.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: The capacity to do work or produce change.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: Strength or energy as an attribute of action.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: Great and impressive power or strength.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: Physical strength and good health.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: Sovereignty or control over a territory.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: The power to enforce rules or give orders.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: The capacity to have an effect on someone or something.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: The authority to give orders and make decisions.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: The state of being the most powerful or important.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: A device for measuring and indicating time.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: A very brief period of time.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: The time or a period of time following the present.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: The time before the present.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: The current moment in time.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: Infinite or unending time.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: Not affected by the passage of time.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: The time during which something continues.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: A period of one hundred years.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: A concept of something without any limit.

levels.name: Level 1
levels.idea: An idea or opinion produced by thinking.

levels.name: Level 2
levels.idea: Reasoning conducted according to strict principles.

levels.name: Level 3
levels.idea: The faculty by which the mind stores and remembers information.

levels.name: Level 4
levels.idea: The center of interest or activity.

levels.name: Level 5
levels.idea: A series of thoughts, images, and sensations occurring in sleep.

levels.name: Level 6
levels.idea: The ability to understand something instinctively.

levels.name: Level 7
levels.idea: To form a mental image or concept of something.

levels.name: Level 8
levels.idea: Aware of and responding to one's surroundings.

levels.name: Level 9
levels.idea: To become aware of something through the senses.

levels.name: Level 10
levels.idea: The study of fundamental questions about existence and knowledge.
